name: All-Star Fielding Challenge VR
description: All-Star Fielding Challenge VR is an exciting baseball fielding simulator that puts you at shortstop as you attempt to field line-drives, pop-ups, and ground balls. Catch enough balls to progress through each round and achieve greatness as you climb the leaderboard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 250 MB available space
